name: Zhang Daqian
description_1: Renowned Chinese modernist celebrated for his mastery of landscape and bamboo painting.
description_2: Prominent figure in Chinese art history, known for his innovative ink paintings and skillful bamboo artworks.

name: Qi Baishi
description_1: Modernist ink painter renowned for delicate renditions of camellias, lotus flowers, and graceful brushwork.
description_2: Celebrated Chinese artist recognized for his exquisite ink paintings of camellias and lotus flowers.
description_3: Honored with the Medal of Honor, a master of brushwork and renowned for his captivating ink paintings.

name: Michelangelo
description_1: Renowned Italian sculptor and painter of the Renaissance, celebrated for "David" and the awe-inspiring Sistine Chapel.
description_2: Distinguished figure of the Italian Renaissance, known for masterpieces like "David" and the captivating frescoes in the Sistine Chapel.
description_3: Accomplished artist and sculptor from the Italian Renaissance, famed for the intricacy of "David" and the spiritual grandeur of the Sistine Chapel.

name: Pablo Picasso
description_1: Spanish artist renowned for his groundbreaking cubist works, including "Guernica" and "Les Demoiselles d'Avignon".
description_2: Pioneer of the Cubism movement, the Spanish artist created iconic pieces like "Guernica" and challenged artistic norms.
description_3: A sculptor turned painter, his abstract style and masterpieces like "Les Demoiselles d'Avignon".

name: Jackson Pollock
description_1: An American avant-garde artist who pioneered "drip painting" and "action painting", known for his experimental and unconventional style.
description_2: Renowned for his chaotic and unconventional approach, this American artist is synonymous with "drip painting" and "action painting".
description_3: A trailblazing figure in abstract expressionism, this American artist revolutionized the art world with his unconventional techniques like "drip painting".

name: Vincent van Gogh
description_1: Prominent Dutch Post-Impressionist known for "The Starry Night", "Sunflowers" and his distinctive brushwork.
description_2: Influential Dutch artist, associated with Impressionism and Expressionism, notable for works like "The Starry Night" and his vibrant brushstrokes.
description_3: Visionary Post-Impressionist painter from the Netherlands, admired for emotionally charged artworks such as "The Starry Night" and "Sunflowers".

name: Leonardo da Vinci
description_1: A brilliant Italian artist and scientist of the Renaissance, known for "Mona Lisa", "The Last Supper", and groundbreaking inventions.
description_2: An iconic polymath from the Italian Renaissance, renowned for his artistic masterpieces like "Mona Lisa" and innovative scientific explorations.
description_3: Celebrated as a multidisciplinary genius, this Italian Renaissance figure left indelible marks through renowned works such as "The Last Supper" and prolific scientific discoveries.

name: Claude Monet
description_1: French Impressionist renowned for capturing the beauty of nature with vibrant colors and the play of light.
description_2: Esteemed French painter of the Impressionist movement, celebrated for his captivating works depicting water lilies and haystacks.
description_3: A French artist of plein air painting, who skillfully portrayed the interplay of color, light, and atmosphere in his artworks.

name: Ai Weiwei
description_1: Renowned Chinese contemporary artist known for provocative artworks such as "Sunflower Seeds" and activism.
description_2: Influential dissident artist from China, celebrated for thought-provoking works like "Bird's Nest" and courageous advocacy.
description_3: Pioneering Chinese artist and activist famed for powerful creations like "Huaqing" and unwavering support for refugees.

name: Rembrandt
description_1: A Dutch Baroque artist renowned for his masterful use of light and shadow in portraits, such as "The Night Watch".
description_2: A prolific Dutch painter of the Baroque era, celebrated for his expressive brushwork and captivating self-portraits.
description_3: A prominent figure in Dutch art, known for his intricate etchings and ability to capture the human spirit in portraits.

name: Xu Beihong
description_1: Prominent Chinese artist known for realistic horse paintings and influential role in the National Art School of Beijing.
description_2: Celebrated figure in Chinese art, renowned for his realistic portrayal of horses and contribution to the development of the National Art School of Beijing.
description_3: Highly regarded artist from China, recognized for his skill in traditional Chinese ink painting, particularly in his famous horse paintings, and his insightful social commentary.

name: Georgia O'Keeffe
description_1: Notable American modernist artist celebrated for flower paintings, Southwestern landscapes, and abstract art.
description_2: American artist at the forefront of modernism, recognized for her iconic flower paintings and depictions of Southwestern landscapes.
